Key Match Events: Sanju Samson hit a quickfire 39 in just 26 balls
Ravindra Jadeja hit an 18-ball 45 not out
Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma backed Sanju Samson ahead of the ongoing T20I series
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma lauded the middle-order, making special mention about Sanju Samson
Miscellaneous Highlights: India took an unbeatable 2-0 lead after hammering Sri Lanka by 7 wickets
Others: India have a problem of plenty as Suryakumar Yadav was in fine form against the West Indies
India do not have Virat Kohli and Rishabh Pant as the duo were rested for the series
